content: I could not agree with you more. the beauty standards promoted by the industry have been limiting and unequal for many years. women need to see themselves represented in all their diversity, be it in terms of age, skin color, body type, or ability. the industry must take responsibility for promoting healthy and positive beauty ideals that uplift and empower all women rather than only a few. it's time for change, and it begins with us, the consumers demanding more from the industry.
